monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Creates a rock obstacle - Activates ground switches
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Aqua Blast
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Attack value.

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 25% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), gain 8 Charge stacks. (Once per attack)

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Carapace
skills.description: Aura: Healing and shielding skills (active and passive) of Reptiles in your party are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Charged Reflexes
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Might, Agility or Sidekick (Buffs).

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Explosive Blast
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fiery Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: First Impact
skills.description: Increases the base damage of the first hit of an attack by an additional 40% of Attack (physical) or Magic (magical). (25% for mass attacks)

skills.name: Fortress
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (350 + 30% Defense) Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Giantsbane
skills.description: This Monster deals 5% more damage. Against enemies with a Health rating of 7 or higher, damage is increased by 20% instead.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heavy Punch
skills.description: 1 x 225% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 290% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 360% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 450% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 565% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Load Up
skills.description: Shield actions apply 1 Charge stack per shield. Passive shields have a 20% chance to apply 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Meteorite Shower
skills.description: 2 x 175% (350%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Shield all allies for 1 x (700 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Phalanx
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Phalanx Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Phalanx Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Physical Resistance
skills.description: Physical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 3 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (90 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 4
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (100 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 5
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 7 x (130 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Shared Might
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Might (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Might.

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Burst
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 140% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Shield Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 175% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Spiky Defense
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Armor Break on the attacker.

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Static Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) also increases non-Critical damage by 15%.

skills.name: Tsunami
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies Removes 2 Buffs from targets

skills.name: Utopia
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Water Surge
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (water) applies Might (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Water Surge Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (water) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself
